text: E'ina hu'negu menina knare antahintahi'zane, ama' antahi'zanena amne kamigahue. Hagi ana agofetura ama mopafima ko'ma efore'ma hu'naza kini vahe'mo'zama onte'nazankna zagofenone, ragima eri'zanena kamigahuanki, henkama fore'ma hanaza kini vahe'mo'zanena, anara hu'za kagrikna kinia eforera osugahaze.
